name: simulate
description: 1 = generated random images, 0 = get images over http

name: desired_particles
description: How many particles should be on the plate, at least, for the experiment to start

name: desired_stepSize
description: The experiment tries to adjust the amplitudes so that the 75% of the particles move less than thisHow many particles should be on the plate, at least, for the experiment to start

name: cycles
description: For each frequency, how many PTV steps is taken in total. The total number of exps cycles * number of frequencies

name: minfreq
description: All notes from the scale below this frequency are discarded.

name: maxfreq
description: All notes from the scale above this frequency are discarded.

name: duration
description: in milliseconds, constant for all notes.

name: default_amp
description: starting amplitude: for 2*3*5 actuators = 0.02 for 2*3*20 actuators = 0.005

name: max_increase
description: never increase the amplitude more than 1.5 x from the previous experiment

name: exps_before_reset
description: The balls are replaced to good locations every this many cycles
